description:
A bright smile can do a lot for you in a day. Donny's is just perfect. He's a 24 year-old-college student from the east coast with a very detailed knowledge of the human body. He's shooting for a doctorate in physical therapy, and you have to wonder what he is capable of in bed with that kind of knowledge!
"If I asked you to identify all the muscles in your body, you can do that for me?" I asked.
"Sure," he smiled as he started undressing.
"How many muscles are in the body?"
"A couple of hundred."
Well, he was able to name all his muscles as he flexed. He knows his stuff!
title: Donny
